Extra_Dialogue.2: I am curious as to why there is a desolate village such as this all the way out here
Extra_Dialogue.3: The savannah was very harsh. I am surprised this village is as prosperous as it is

Refute_Question.1: We are not friendly enough for me to answer that
Refute_Question.2: I do not want to tell you that
Refute_Question.3: I refuse to say anything about that subject

Ask_Name.1: I am curious as to what you call yourself
Ask_Name.2: What do the residents of this village know you as
Ask_Name.3: What is a strong leader such as yourself called

Ask_Origin.1: What is this village known as
Ask_Origin.2: What do you and the people here call this village

Ask_Reason.1: Why do you choose to live here

Friend_Response.1: I am here to form a friendship with this village and its people
Friend_Response.2: I come before you with only peaceful intentions
Friend_Response.3: I wanted to see the rumored beauty of your village for myself

Friend_Reason.1: I am here to form a friendship with this village and its people
Friend_Reason.2: I come before you with only peaceful intentions
Friend_Reason.3: I wanted to see the rumored beauty of your village for myself

Bad_Response.1: I am here to see how pathetic this village is for my own eyes
Bad_Response.2: I came here to determine whether or not you could defend yourself from Ogun. Your defenses are laughable to say the least
Bad_Response.3: This village is as awful as the surrounding landscape

Bad_Reason.1: I am here to see how pathetic this village is for my own eyes
Bad_Reason.2: I came here to determine whether or not you could defend yourself from Ogun. Your defenses are laughable to say the least
Bad_Reason.3: This village is as awful as the surrounding landscape

Response_Origin.2: I hail from an unmarked village
Response_Origin.3: I come from a place that you won't find on any map

Response_Name.1: It is an honor to be in your presence
Response_Name.2: It is truly a pleasure to meet you
Response_Name.3: I have heard many great things about you

Good_Intentions.1: I look forward to getting along with the people of this village
Good_Intentions.2: I hope I can become a valuable asset to your village

Village_Response.1: I have traveled from the far away city of
Village_Response.2: I come from the city of

Familiar_Greet.1: I am happy to see you in good health
Familiar_Greet.2: I hope you and the village have been prosperous
Familiar_Greet.3: It is a honor to once again be in your presence

Question_Denied_Old.3: Maybe you will tell me in the future

action_boast.2: I have many heroic feats under my belt.

action_intimidate.1: I could take you down unarmed.
action_intimidate.2: Don't think you can get away from me.

request_spar.1: I see you don't want to cooperate
request_spar.2: I feel like it would be in both our interests if you would tell me

response_spar.1: I see you don't want to cooperate
response_spar.2: I feel like it would be in both our interests if you would tell me
response_spar.3: I must ask you to reconsider answering me

action_compliment.1: I can tell you have trained alot.
action_compliment.2: You seem like a smart person.

action_bribe.2: Could I interest you in something good?

action_grovel.1: I am not worthy. You are too great!

question_alliance.1: You should form an alliance with someone.

response_alliance.1: I have no need for that.

response_experience.1: I once fought off several bandits.
response_experience.2: I once insulted Ogun and got away alive.

quest_accept.1: Yes I will see what I can do about the rebel scum

quest_deny.1: That sounds dangerous. Maybe another time
